title: Soft Pneumatic Actuator Design and Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of mechanical engineering and materials science, foundational understanding of fluid mechanics
context.additional_context: A professional training program combining theoretical learning with simulation-based practice to enhance design capabilities

learning_goals: Students can explain the basic operating principles of soft pneumatic actuators and their design parameters (pressure-displacement-load relationships).
Students can design an optimal actuator structure for given load conditions.
Students can apply performance prediction and verification methods for actuators using energy minimization models.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
